answers.text: Any tagged instances or resources are automatically monitored by Amazon GuardDuty and Amazon Inspector.
Tagging instances or other resources with an owner or work queue can help to identify the right people to engage.
Tagging systems with an attribute or data classification can help to estimate the impact of an incident.
Tagging an instance or another resource causes it to be tracked and logged by AWS CloudTrail.
Tagging of resources is a requirement if you want technical support from AWS.
